snippet: The company announced it would take charges of more than $2.7 billion because of weakening demand for its rigs.
abstract: Transocean announces it will take charges of more than $2.7 billion because of weakening demand for its rigs, sign that lower prices are starting to exact toll on oil industry.
lead_paragraph: The company announced it would take charges of more than $2.7 billion because of weakening demand for its rigs.

headline.main: Transocean Challenged by Plummeting Oil Prices
headline.print_headline: Transocean Challenged by Plummeting Oil Prices
